name: Run boy, run: escape from a dungeon
name_original: Run boy, run: escape from a dungeon
description:
Hello my friend. This is the second game that I developed myself. I will be very happy if you try to play it and leave your opinion about it in the comments. This will help me make it better. I really liked the game Geometry Dash and I tried to do something similar, But with its own unique atmosphere. Here are the main features of the game:

- One-click game control!
- Increase difficulty from easy to incredible!
- Extremely  fast gameplay.
- A lot of modes that change in the course of the game!
- Every 5th level is a challenge!
- Online rating of the best players!
- Challenge your friends and other players around the world!

If you want to support my project. I will always be happy with any donation)

Here is a link to the game in Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sngames.runboyrun

Good day, my friend!
